column5: Hey guys, I'm hoping tonight is the night for the site to be back up, i'm calling my server guy and we're hoping to get it all fixed around 8 tonight. The main page has a completely new look as well, and we will be doing live results from the vanity cup again this year. I really appreciate everyone being more than patience as this has grown into a much longer delay then i had expected. For the guy who is heading to Tobin, when are you going? Thanks everyone, Travis
Just tried, still nothing. Beginning to lose hope. :( Fish ON!!
thanks for the info guys! look forward to the site getting back up. heading up to Tobin on October 11, hopefully won't be as cold and snowy as it was last year. looking forward to the hawgs!!
I'll be up there the week before you. I'll post a report on how we do.

Does anyone know what the problem is? This site has been down for a couple of weeks now. Trying to stay on top of the info coming out of Tobin Lake as we are headed up there in October. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks.
Site will be back up in a few day according to another avid site reader. Born to Fish But Forced To Work
I talked to Travis and he's hoping to have the site running soon.Having problems with his surver.So lets hope its going soon? i'll keep you posted.NM
Any idea what's going on with the site? Is there a new URL that I haven't seen. It's still not up as of today, in fact the URL address no longer exists on the web. I feel so lost... LOL!
Any idea what's going on with the site? Is there a new URL that I haven't seen. It's still not up as of today, in fact the URL address no longer exists on the web. I feel so lost... LOL!
I got the same thing today aswell. Here are a few other boards that deal with manitoba.http://members3.boardhost.com/fishmanitoba/http://www.looneybeaver.com/forum/ Fish ON!!
